element.name: altGlyph

element.name: altGlyphDef
element.x:contentmodel:
Any number of 'script' elements, and either:
one or more 'glyphRef' elements, or
one or more 'altGlyphItem' elements.

element.name: altGlyphItem
element.attributecategories: aria, navigation, core
element.x:contentmodel: Any number of 'script' elements, and one or more 'glyphRef' elements.
